ChefsHatGym.KEF.DataSetManager module¶

class ChefsHatGym.KEF.DataSetManager.DataSetManager(dataSetDirectory=None, verbose=True)¶

DataSet Manager Class

This class manages the function of the framework to create datasets. Here each datapoint is created, and written if necessary.

Attributes:
dataSetDiretory (String): This variable keeps the directory which the dataSet files are stored.

Author: Pablo Barros Created on: 26.02.2020 Last Update: 26.02.2020

Todo:
  • Create functions to log images and graphs as well.

ChefsHatGym.KEF.ExperimentManager module¶

class ChefsHatGym.KEF.ExperimentManager.ExperimentManager(baseDirectory, experimentName, verbose=True, saveLog=False)¶

Experiment Manager Class

This class manager the experiments. It creates all the folder structures, if necessary and create the log.

Attributes:
baseDirectory (String): Base directory of the experiment. experimentName (String): Name of the experiment. logManager (LogManager):

Author: Pablo Barros Created on: 02.02.2017 Last Update: 20.02.2017

ChefsHatGym.KEF.LogManager module¶

class ChefsHatGym.KEF.LogManager.Logger(logDirectory=None, saveLog=True, verbose=True)¶

Log Manager Class

This class manager the log function of the framework. Here the log is created, and written if necessary.

Attributes:
logDiretory (String): This variable keeps the directory which the log file is saved.

Author: Pablo Barros Created on: 02.02.2017 Last Update: 20.02.2017

Todo:
  • Create functions to log images and graphs as well.
endLogSession()¶

Function that writes the end of a session in the Log.

Args:
sessionName (String): The name of the new session

Raises:

Exception: if the logDirectory is invalid.
isLogDirectoryValid(logDirectory)¶

Function that verifies if the log directory is valid and is an openable document.

Args:
logDirectory (String): the directory where the log is / will be is saved

Raises:

Exception: if the logDirectory is invalid.
Returns:
True if succesfull, raises the exception otherwise.
logDirectory¶
newLogSession(sessionName)¶

Function that writes a new session in the Log.

Args:
sessionName (String): The name of the new session

Raises:

Exception: if the logDirectory is invalid.
verbose¶
write(message)¶

Function that writes messages in the log.

Args:
message (String): The message which will be written in the log.

Raises:

Exception: if the logDirectory is invalid.

DataSet Manager Class
